channel.title: What base would be best to do this with?
channel.description: So i want to create a server, with economy, quest's and alot of Runescape feature's... Nothing to extreme. I don't really like delta niether do i like Project Insanity (as this is unstable & the community would take dislike to the DC every 5 minute's.). I've herd Hyperion is good. Although i dont know to much about the base it's self. Also RS2HD for 562. But i would like to have a perfect door system. This is kinda' hard to add to a 562 so i think that option has gone out the window. I'm willing to spend at least 6+ hours a day coding this server.. So if you was going to do something like this what base would you use? *Please reply i wan't to get started as fast as possible* Thanks alot, Microfire.

item.title: What base would be best to do this with?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

562 if you know how to code it.

Read full topic

item.title: What base would be best to do this with?

@Microfire wrote:

So i want to create a server, with economy, quest’s and alot of Runescape feature’s…
Nothing to extreme. I don’t really like delta niether do i like Project Insanity (as this is unstable & the community would take dislike to the DC every 5 minute’s.).
I’ve herd Hyperion is good. Although i dont know to much about the base it’s self. Also RS2HD for 562. But i would like to have a perfect door system. This is kinda’ hard to add to a 562 so i think that option has gone out the window.
I’m willing to spend at least 6+ hours a day coding this server…
So if you was going to do something like this what base would you use?
Please reply i wan’t to get started as fast as possible
Thanks alot,
